data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 425 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cayman Brac, Cayman Islands
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,582 lost in Cayman Brac that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Cayman Brac. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Cayman Brac to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Cayman Brac, Cayman Islands to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Cayman Brac, Cayman Islands to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Cayman Brac, Cayman Islands so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cayman Brac, Cayman Islands has a population of 2,008.

We estimate Cayman Brac has 425 people who might know Jesus, 1,219 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 363 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.
